mapper.insert: INSERT INTO GROUPBUYING (TITLE, CONTENT, REGIDATE, GOALDATE, GOALTARGET, NUM, PERSONNUM) VALUES (#{title}, #{content}, #{regidate}, #{goaldate}, #{goaltarget}, #{num}, #{personNum})
mapper.update: UPDATE GROUPBUYING SET TITLE = #{title}, CONTENT = #{content}, REGIDATE = #{regidate}, GOALDATE = #{goaldate}, GOALTARGET = #{goaltarget}, NUM = #{num}, PERSONNUM = #{personNum} WHERE GNO = #{gno}
UPDATE GROUPBUYING SET PERSONNUM = PERSONNUM + 1 WHERE num = #{num}
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO BUYING (ID, BUYNO, BUYINGDATE, CATEGORY, NUM, PRODUCTNAME, AGE, GENDER, ADDRESS) SELECT U.ID, seq_buying.nextval, SYSDATE, M.CATEGORY, M.NUM, M.PRODUCTNAME, U.AGE, U.GENDER, U.ADDRESS FROM USERS U, MARKET M WHERE U.ID = #{id} AND M.NUM = #{num}
